summary: During summer vacation on Fire Island, three young people become very close. When an uncool girl tries to infiltrate the trio's newly found relationship, they construct an elaborate plot that has violent results.
cast: Barbara Hershey|Richard Thomas|Bruce Davison|Catherine Burns|Ernesto Gonzalez|Conrad Bain|Lou Gary|Andrew Krance|Eileen Letchworth|Wayne Mayer|Maeve McGuire|Ed Stevlingson|Peter Turgeon|Ralph Waite|Lydia Wilen
title: El verano pasado
